summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5686 for the improvement of West Trenton Street, from Fauntleroy Avenue to 45th Avenue Southwest; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75226, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
